document_name: Institutional Strengthening and Capacity Building Support to the Ministry of Education project document.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/TTO/00042336/Institutional Strengthening and Capacity Building Support to the Ministry of Education project document.pdf

donor_name: MINISTRY OF EDUCATION, TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO
outputs.output_descr:
Intended outcomes of the project include:
1) Improved efficiency and higher quality of education in Trinidad and Tobago through the building of capacity in local education professionals.
2) Improved programming and project management capacity through the development and implementation of systems and frameworks.
3) Promotion of the UN Volunteer ethic to encourage community service, outreach, and comnited actions for the public good.

project_descr: Institutional Strengthening and Capacity Building Support to the Ministry of Education - Trinidad and Tobago
